node.html: Stan Dudley is a Piano Technician & performer based in Des Moines, IA. After many years of providing piano services to the Des Moines area, Stan determined that he needed to market his services on the internet to compete with others in the field. Initially he was planning on using a 'Site Building' application provided free by his ISP but after consulting with him, we determined we could leverage current free resources to build a more current and marketable website. This site is backed by CraftCMS and provides a powerful, clean and simple admin for Stan to update his content.

frontmatter.title: Veva Sound Upload Portal
frontmatter.subtitle: Design & Re-Design of Client Delivery Application

node.html: The VeVa Sound Uploader application allows Veva Sound to receive large audio projects from their clients. I was initially involved in both the project management and development of the front-end. Recently, Veva Sound underwent a re-branding which required their customer facing tools to be redesigned to match. This re-design was challenging in that while I did have some familiarity with the application, several other developers had worked on it and build & deployment systems had changed. Being an Ember application, it took some time for me to get the project running locally without having access to the backend services it was dependent on. When the application was initially developed, both the client and administration pages shared the same design aesthetic. The new client facing page has a different design so I had to take care to insure the client facing CSS styles were isolated from the administration styles. The repo for this project is the initial HTML/SCSS styles that were later integrated into the Ember application.
